lead_paragraph: The Russian leader is thought to have achieved most of his goals in the Middle East, reinforcing his country’s new image as a heavyweight on the global stage.

headline.print_headline: Putin’s Syria Tactics Keep Him at the Fore and Leave Everyone Else Guessing
headline.main: Putin’s Syria Tactics Keep Him at the Fore and Leave Everyone Else Guessing

snippet: The Russian leader is thought to have achieved most of his goals in the Middle East, reinforcing his country’s new image as a heavyweight on the global stage.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir Putin's surprise order to withdraw bulk of Russian forces from Syria, after just five months there, comes after Putin has accomplished many of his goals in Syria, including return to world stage, but before Russia is drawn too deeply into Syrian quagmire.
